title: HooToo® HT-PC002 SuperSpeed USB 3.0 2-Port PCI-E Add-on Expansion Card with Internal USB 3.0 19-pin Motherboard Male Header & 5V 4-Pin Molex Power Connector (VIA VL800 Chipset, Premium Solid Capacitors)
description: HooToo HT-PC002 USB 3.0 2 Port PCI Express card with internal 19 Pin header provides your desktop PC with 2 additional USB 3.0 ports. With a PCI-E slot and a 4 pin power cable you can enjoy 10 times faster transfer speed than USB 2.0. Internal 19 Pin header allows extending more external USB 3.0 ports and other devices.Specifications- USB Ports : 2 USB 3.0 backward ports- Power: Internal 4 pin DC power connector- PCI-E type: Support PCI-E X1/X16 slot- Internal header: Internal 19 pin header- Compatibility: Backwards compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1 devices.Operation EnvironmentWindows XP, Vista, 7, 8(32/64 bit)* Latest driver installation is required. Please go to HooToo website or contact HooToo support for it* Windows 8 doesn't need to install driverPackage Includes1 * USB 3.0 PCI-E card1 * Installation driver1 * User ManualRemark- This card will take up 1 PCI-Express slot and a 4 pin DC cable on your PC motherboard.- This card is designed to add USB 3.0 ports at the back of your PC according to the position of your PC's 4 pin DC molex.- Installation driver is needed for operation (included in package)- 2.4Ghz wireless devices like mouse and keyboard will not work closely with USB 3.0 ports of this card
